argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mopnval.1 | |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_mopntopon | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_toponss | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A e. J ) -> A C_ X ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ A e. J ) -> A C_ X ) |
